HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.seeAndGo: See the sights, explore the destinations

SubmitComplaintPage.title: Submit Complaints
SubmitComplaintPage.complaintText:
Dear user,
You can follow up your complaints by one of the following methods:
- Fill out the form available on the contact page. In the subject section, select the "complaint" option.
- Contact support by phone number 02177415954
- Send an email with the subject "complaint" to the address info@gashtook.com  (The email must contain the registered phone number in the user profile and the complaint subject)
- Send an SMS to the number 30000123000724  (The SMS must contain the registered phone number in the user profile and the complaint subject)
Note that only complaints filled out with verified information will be reviewed.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.faqDescription:
How to become a member of Gashtook?
Gashtook works with people with good taste and a similar spirit. Send your resume to the address info@gashtook.com

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.aboutUsDescription:
Welcome to Gashtook! We aim to increase our knowledge of our country by traveling to different cities. Our team makes it easier for you to find what you are looking for by introducing the available options in the cities. With Gashtook, you can see the sights and go to the places you want.
We are a team of energetic and active people who strive to introduce different cities and tourist attractions of our country. Our country is very beautiful, but many of us Iranians do not have a detailed knowledge of the tourist and entertainment potential of our country. Our team is committed to showing you a view of different cities according to your needs.
The introduction of historical sites, parks and entertainment centers, medical and service centers, museums and galleries, restaurants and cafes, hotels, shopping centers, and... is part of our goals. In Gashtook, we travel to different places and become a guardian of the beauty and available facilities.
We hope that we have been able to make your work easier and your entertainment more enjoyable with this tool.
Gashtook was founded in 97 by a team of experienced and active people with the guidance of Seyed Mehdi Seyed Hajie (owner of the brand).

cityPage.descriptionCity: The weather of the province is in the mountainous regions, moderate in the valleys and semi-desert areas. Rivers such as Jajarud, Lareh, Habelehroud, Shoor, and... are among the sources of water in the province.

contact-us.title: Contact Us
contact-us.exactAddress: Tehran, Ashrafi Esfahani Highway, Tehran, Tehran Province
contact-us.descriptionFrom: Gashtook welcomes your suggestions, criticisms and complaints. If you want to contact Gashtook directly, please send your request through the form below or directly to the contactus.gashtook@gmail.com address
